name: QR code
description: Display a QR code in your project.

actions.name: Set text
actions.description: Set the text content of the QR code.

params.name: Text
params.description: Text content of the QR code.

actions.name: Set correction level
actions.description: Set the error correction level. Higher levels include more error correction data for reliability.

params.name: Correction level
params.description: The error correction level. Higher levels include more error correction data for reliability.
